pbrief.product_brief: A simple CLI tool that can be used to help build out specifications for products and features that are easily accessible as context for LLM coding tools.
pbrief.pillars: cli based chat with agents that build hte requirement JSON files

architecture.backend: Can call to APIs on everest chat using a set of predefined agents in the ./agents folder.

features_list.feature_focus: Clean menu that can be used to trigger chats in the CLI that build specific menus.
